lyrics.text:
Pea tuku atu
‘Ene pule lelei
Ki māmani kotoa pē
Ke monū’ia ai.

Pea ‘i he ‘ao,
‘O e Kapiteni;
Ke tau tau, ‘a e tau lelei
‘O e tui, mo au.

Ke tau loto taha,
‘O fai fakataha;
Pea tau hiki ki he tau,
‘O hotau ‘Otua.

Ko e mahafu tau,
‘Oku tau tali’aki,
Ko e loto ta’engaue,
Na’e ‘ia Sīsū.
